meanings.definition: A type of tumor affecting the lymph nodes.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with lymphogranulomata after finding a growth in their lymph nodes.
meanings.sent2: The research study focused on the treatment of lymphogranulomata in patients with lymph node tumors.
meanings.sent3: When the lymphogranulomata in the lymph nodes started singing, it was quite a surprise!
meanings.sent4: Her lymphogranulomata was a ticking time bomb, silently growing within her lymph nodes.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lymphogranulomata invading the lymph nodes was etched in his mind.

meanings.definition: Plural form of lymphogranuloma, a disease characterized by inflammation of the lymph nodes.
meanings.sent1: The hospital reported multiple cases of lymphogranulomata, all showing signs of lymph node inflammation.
meanings.sent2: Doctors were concerned about the spread of lymphogranulomata among patients with swollen lymph nodes.
meanings.sent3: The party theme was 'Lymphogranulomata Galore,' where guests dressed up as inflamed lymph nodes!
meanings.sent4: In the garden of health, the flowers of lymphogranulomata bloomed in the lymph nodes.
meanings.sent5: The community worked together to raise awareness about the dangers of lymphogranulomata affecting the lymph nodes.
